document_data.name: Summergarth Facilitations
document_data.mainbody: '''Summergarth Facilitations''' was a business in the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Geography: The establishment was found on [[Leaping Dolphin Lane]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The business was owned by [[Halthara Summergarth]], who made barrels and crates and also owned a ship.
